hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RS-$$" /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init start
#vm image fixup /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init fixup
/puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://esb3.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog2.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ################ /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-server.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-server_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-server_avahi.sh'
